name: Dick Porter and the Defiled Idol
name_original: Dick Porter and the Defiled Idol
description:
Dick Porter and the Defiled Idol is the result of Make-A-Thing game jam by two new students doing game Design / Programming. The words they were given to work with were "Parallel," "Vermilion" and "Remedy." If you can't see the connection by the time you finish this single level game then we obviously failed. But hey, we did it.

The controls are confusing but they work. The hit boxes are iffy but they trigger. Stop Hatin' and see what comes next.

Programming By : Zane Ilsley.

Art and level Design By: VC Penguin.
